headline.main: Samsung Group Repeats It Did Not Pay Bribes, Seek Improper Favors
headline.print_headline: Samsung Group Repeats It Did Not Pay Bribes, Seek Improper Favors

lead_paragraph: South Korean conglomerate Samsung Group [SAGR.UL] reiterated on Monday that it did not pay bribes or seek illicit favors in response to the special prosecutor's announcement accusing the group's leader of paying money to curry favor from President Park Geun-hye.
